column4: hi, is there any reason why gdesklets might not work for Ubuntu 10.04?
is this a roundabout way of saying "gdesklets doesn't work on my 10.04 system"?
,your one sharpe cookie, i feel stupid, but i don't know the file structure of Ubuntu well enough yet to even know where to start. I've only been using linux for a week ;)
what happens if you try "gdekslets" from a terminal?
I don't know, let me go check
The result dos'nt look good, can I P.M it to you or should i put in pastebin
pastebin, please.
any in particular
any of them would be fine
http://pastebin.com/NbU5rueM
it mentions a log file...don't suppose that is about?
One second.....
Have looked it .gdesklets in /home and have looked in /usr/share/gdesklets, Where else should i think about looking?
it's not in your home directory?
there is a folder called .gdesklets/logs but its empty
sorrythere is a folder called .gdesklets/logs but its empty
nothing in your home directory?
.xsession-errorsold
I just cant see anything thats obviously related
looks like a known problem: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gdesklets/+bug/544840
there's a solution at the the end of that thread; hopefully it works for you.
Looking now, thanks mate
They all seem to know how to solve the problem, but i don't get which solution should i follow?
Thanks for everything. Problem Solved
